title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Boosts North Korea Sanctions
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Boosts North Korea Sanctions
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Margaret Talev\u0010Senior White House Reporter\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Discussing reaction to U.S. sanctions on North Korea with Stephan Haggard, Fellow at Peterson Institute for International Economics.
